entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 10:34PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Patchy Ice Expected Early Monday Morning... Temperatures will fall below freezing across the entire region by dawn Monday morning. This will result in patchy ice from the lingering moisture from Sunday`s rain and melting snow. Early morning motorists should use caution and consider that any surface appearing to be wet may in fact be icy.
